summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 9 and 10, Evans and Blewett's Addition, being the alley between 3rd Avenue West and 4th Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 102687 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
